name: FBA English Resources
body:
## Welcome!
Welcome to the First Baptist Academy English website.  See below for resources on writing, MLA and Works Cited templates, and information on upcoming major assignments.

## Summer Reading Assignments
Be sure to complete the summer reading assignment for the class your teacher has approved you to take.  If you have a question, please contact Mrs. Knezek or Mrs. Roeder.  Click on the links below.

* [AP English IV](Files/AP English IV Summer Reading Assignment 2013.doc)
* [English IV](Files/English IV Summer Reading 2013.doc)
* [AP English III](Files/AP Eng III Summer Reading Assignment.docx)
* [English III](Files/English III Summer Reading.docx)
* [Pre-AP English II](Files/English II Pre-AP Summer Reading Assignment 2013.doc)
* [English II](Files/English II Summer Reading Assignment 2013.doc)
* [Pre-AP English I](Files/Hon Eng I Summer Reading.docx)
* [English I](Files/Eng I Summer Reading.docx)
* [English 8](Files/English 8 Summer Reading - Mythology.doc)
* [English 7](Files/7th Summer Reading 2013.doc)

## Resources
* [MLA formatting template](Files/MLA Template.docx)
* Works Cited page template

## Teacher Emails
* [Mrs. Knezek](mailto:lknezek@firstdallas.org)
* [Mrs. Roeder](mailto:groeder@firstdallas.org)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
